title: Diagnose Cell Tower Failure
description: An automated alert indicates a cell tower is offline. The agent must diagnose the root cause by analyzing diagnostic logs and system status.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the alert for the specific tower ID and retrieve its diagnostic logs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly pulls the last 24 hours of logs for the specified cell tower.

tasks.description: Analyze logs for critical errors (e.g., power failure, backhaul link down, hardware malfunction).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the primary error code from the logs.

tasks.description: Create a trouble ticket and assign it to the correct field engineering team based on the error type.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a ticket with the correct diagnosis and assigns it to the power systems team.
